# Description

Junior Data Steward at Open and Responsible Science (ORS) - Engagement & Research Services.
My background is in Psychology: Methodology and Statistics and I have experience in supporting reproducible and responsible research practices, data management and open science community building (OSCLeiden).
I am passionate about making research more transparent, reusable and collaborative!
